description.en:
An Anthology by Umishima Senbon, containing various one-shots.

1. Kami wa Onna no/Hair is Girl's...: Ako-chan is teased for for fluffy, curly hair, but her sister has a plan...

2. Yururi to Umi to Tokidoki Iruka

4. Millefeuille no Hibi: A beautiful one shot depicting daily lives of young talents by famous animator of various famous animes (Black Bullet, Attack of the Titans, Arslan Senki, Her and Her Cat)

6. Boku no Sophia: A beautiful sentimental one shot by famous animator of various famous animes (Black Bullet, Attack of the Titans, Arslan Senki, Her and Her Cat, etc...)

7. Date With a Cat in Dubrovnik: A girl misses meeting up with her lover in Dubrovnik, Croatia due to a delayed flight. A cat from the Old Town of Dubrovnik appears and guides her through the town. This is now chapter 7 of the tankoubon.

10. Hair is Girl's... The Sequel"

The rest seems to be new. I may jump around some based on my own preference, since this is an anthology and the chapter orders mean nothing.
